summary:
The Vanderbilt family became famous in America during the late 1800s. They made their fortune in shipping and trains. Cornelius Vanderbilt started the family's success, and his relatives built big houses and gave money to help others. They were the richest family in the US for a long time.

Their big houses, like those on Fifth Avenue and in Newport, are now famous landmarks or museums. The family's importance lessened over time, but some famous people today are still Vanderbilt relatives.
title: Vanderbilt family
